content: BITCHEMICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE & DEFI PLATFORM Transform chemistry research with AI, digital technology and automation. Drive innovation in the chemical industries. Bitchemical next generation Decentralized Finance Platform. Instantly swap crypto tokens, no registration or account needed.WHITEPAPER | WEBSITE |  APP | X  | TELEGRAM  | FACEBOOK  | INSTAGRAM | MEDIUM | CMC  Total Token allocated for this bounty will be 500,000,000 of BCHEC (50,000 USD) Token 1 BCHEC Token List Price= 0,0001 USDWEEK 1 SEPTEMBER 13 - SEPTEMBER 17 (ENDING)WEEK 2 SEPTEMBER 18 - SEPTEMBER 24 (ENDING)WEEK 3 SEPTEMBER 25 - OCTOBER 01 (ENDING)WEEK 4 OCTOBER 02 - OCTOBER 08(ENDING)WEEK 5 OCTOBER 09 - OCTOBER 15  (ENDING)WEEK 6  OCTOBER 16 - OCTOBER 22 (ENDING) LAST WEEK  OCTOBER 23 - OCTOBER 29 (ENDING) The funds will be split into different campaigns in such a format:X Campaign: 10%Facebook Campaign: 10%Telegram Campaign: 5%Blog/Article Campaign: 25%Video : 25%Social Media Influencer : 25%Format to post your workCode:QuoteWeek #1XRepost1.2.3.4.5.Post1.2.Bitchemical X Account: https://twitter.com/BitchemicalRegistration form: https://forms.gle/zm5byriqbZDyVKpZ6Format to post your workCode:QuoteWeek #1FacebookShares + Likes1.2.3.4.5.Bitchemical Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/ChemicalDefi/Registration form: https://forms.gle/S2XHWfCqJVpuKKKC7Bitchemical Telegram Channel : https://t.me/bitchemicaldefi/Bitchemical Telegram Group : https://t.me/bitchemicaldefi_comRegistration form: https://forms.gle/suogx3dRawJnm8YU9Quote● Telegram Report ●Week#:- Telegram User Name:- Custom Post Link #1:- Custom Post Link #2:- Custom Post Link #3:VIDEO CAMPAIGN- Add the video link you prepared according to the rules mentioned above to the bounty form.- In the description section of your video, there should be website links and a short description.- Registration form: https://forms.gle/TwWeoP8Ait6oyApt8BLOG/ARTICLE CAMPAIGN- Add the blog/article link you prepared according to the rules mentioned above to the bounty form.Registration form: https://forms.gle/utqf9PA8fT76e8Bk8SOCIAL MEDIA INFLUENCER CAMPAIGN- Add the post link you prepared according to the rules mentioned above to the bounty form.- Please fill out the form again after each of your shares.Registration form: https://forms.gle/EeNJn7PRpBLUaC978 DO YOU WANT TO EARN REFERRAL REWARDS? WHAT IS A REFERRAL REWARDS? HOW EARNED?What is referral rewards? The Bitchemical AI & Defi Platform is a new platform. The Bitchemical Token (BCHEC) belonging to our platform is currently in the pre-sale stage.  Bitchemical tokensale is done in two ways. The first sales channel IFO/ILO/launchpad platforms. The second sales channel is our own tokensale application. We will offer you extra earnings with the referral link that you will use through our own tokensale application. Create a member registration in our Tokensale application. Explain your followers how to participate in the Bitchemical tokensale and share your referral link in your video. When your followers buy tokens with your referral link, you will receive 10% of the investment amount as BNB or BUSD tokens. (1 BCHEC = 0,0001 BUSD)Our tokensale application:   https://bitchemicaldefi.com/tokensaleHow to buy Bitchemical (BCHEC) Token? https://medium.com/@bitchemicaldefi/how-to-buy-bitchemical-bchec-tokenSPREADSHEET : https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tjFC2huETI_qE4j3k-ML_3whKAhaRmSdXReOKZ4jy8c/edit?usp=sharingThank you for your interesting. Bitchemical AI&DEFI Technologies.
